MAN.NAME: coax_syn

PARAMETERS.RHS: offset of the inner conductor from the center (meters)

indicates which parameters should be optimized
synthesize a
synthesize b
synthesize c
synthesize er
PARAMETERS.LHS: synthesized inner radius of outer conductor (meters)
synthesized offset of the inner conductor from the center (meters)

MAN.DESCRIPTION: Function to synthesize the physical parameters of a coaxial transmission line to achieve a given set of electrical characteristics.
MAN.AUTHOR: Dan McMahill
